publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2391 Willie Coffey: Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross—That the Parliament recognises the close association between the town of Darvel in the Loudoun Valley and the Special Air Service Regiment; commends the bravery displayed by Lt Col Blair Mayne of that regiment during the Second World War, and joins the Northern Ireland Assembly in calling on the Ministry of Defence to reconsider the case for the posthumous award of the Victoria Cross.
S3M-2391 Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross (lodged on 13 August 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-2391 Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross (lodged on 13 August 2008) Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-2391 Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross (lodged on 13 August 2008) Mike Pringle*, Angela Constance*
S3M-2391 Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross (lodged on 13 August 2008) Andrew Welsh*
S3M-2391 Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross (lodged on 13 August 2008) Stuart McMillan*, Brian Adam* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-2391 Lt Col Blair Mayne - Posthumous Award of Victoria Cross (lodged on 13 August 2008) Gil Paterson*
